long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kili helps you automate repetitive tasks using the power of LLMs. Use of Chrome Extension to run any task that you set up on Kili.

Here are some tasks that you can automate with Kili: extract data from a webpage, email a summary of the webpage to yourself and craft a personalized message for a sales lead.
